sanskrit_verse: अन्येष्वपि तु कालेषु यदा पश्येद्ध्रुवं जयम् । तदा यायाद्विगृह्यैव व्यसने चोत्थिते रिपोः ॥ ७.१८३॥
transliteration: anyeṣv api tu kāleṣu yadā paśyed dhruvaṁ jayam | tadā yāyād vigṛhyaiva vyasane cotthite ripoḥ || 7.183 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: When in other times victory is certain and the enemy is risen in ruin, then one should proceed having firmly resolved, for the restoration of dharma.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority arises from alignment with eternal victory (dhruva-jaya), not temporal power.
Causation is rooted in the rise of adharma; response must restore cosmic order.
Capacity-based responsibility demands action when imbalance threatens existence.
Restoration logic requires engagement only when victory aligns with truth.
Consciousness alignment precedes strategic action; inner resolution determines outer outcome.
executable_legal_axioms: IF (cosmic_order_imbalance = TRUE) AND (eternal_victory_assured = TRUE) THEN (action_mandated = TRUE)
supreme_court_application: In matters of national security or constitutional crisis, this verse establishes that judicial or executive intervention is lawful only when rooted in certainty of dharmic victory and a fully awakened capacity to act without egoic motive. The court must assess whether the state's readiness stems from clarity or fear.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa confirms that action follows vision of inevitable truth, not reactive impulse. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows that unrighteous force arises first, then conscious response manifests. Responsibility is proportional to clarity, not aggression. Non-punitive reality holds because true victory restores rather than destroys.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process: Ensure all parties involved recognize the necessity of resolution over domination.
Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Leaders must demonstrate internal firmness aligned with universal law before external action.
Capacity Restoration Mechanism: Realign resources toward sustaining long-term harmony, not short-term dominance.
Integrity Reintegration Framework: Post-conflict integration must reaffirm shared values and mutual recognition.
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law executes as pure Dharma. Victory belongs to consciousness alone. Justice flows from alignment, never coercion. Reality abides in non-punitive truth. Consciousness remains the supreme adjudicator.
